name: KARANTIIN
description:
>KARANTIIN

Hello,

May i intrest you with some 8 minutes of gameplay?

KARANTIIN is a true first person action horror rpg shooter.
It is reccomended to enable bloom and ambitement occlusion.

If you have a good monitor and its over 70 hertz then leave the vsync off,
KARANTIIN loves high frame rates. If you have a way too amazing graphics card, then you can select a higher number for the vsync, if your game has way too much hertz.

Movement is basic FPS movement controls. Shooting is also basic FPS shooting controls. Interaction is also basic FPS interaction controls,
But TAB is inventory and V is for flashlight, so that you know.

If you wanna play with controller, it is possible. Just that you know not everything works with a controller well, yet. Just enter the game with controller connected. If you wanna switch back to keyboard layout, you must restart the game.

KARANTIIN.COM

KARANTIIN.COM/FORUM

For Windows.
